text:
Champions League
Bar√ßa - Slavia Prague streaming: where to see the match?
Bar√ßa receive in their stadium the small finger of the group F Slavia Prague on behalf of the fourth day of the Champions League. Discover how to watch this meeting in streaming.
05 Nov 2019, 04:30 by Antoine Chirat



Antoine GriezmannClub previous: Atletico MadridPayment: 120 million eurosIcon Sport



Frenkie De JongClub previous: Ajax AmsterdamCompensation: 75 million eurosIcon Sport



NetoClub previous: ValenciaIndemnity: 26 million eurosIcon Sport



Junior FirpoClub previous: Real BetisIndemnity: 18 million eurosIcon Sport



EmersonClub previous: Atletico MGIndemnity: 12 million eurosIcon Sport



Marc CucurellaClub previous: EibarCompensation: 4 million eurosIcon Sport

Bar√ßa: all the recruits of the transfer window 2019




Defeated in the league this weekend on the field of Levante (3-1), Bar√ßa must redeem themselves in the Champions League and the reception of Slavia Prague appears as the ideal opportunity. First in his group, the Blaugrana can get closer to a qualification if successful against the Czechs they have already beaten on the last day 2-1.







Bar√ßa - Slavia Prague streaming




Luis Suarez + 6 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport

The match between Bar√ßa and Slavia Prague is broadcast on Tuesday, November 5 on RMC Sport 2 for French television from 18:55 French time. A channel accessible by subscription to a limited number of audiovisual actors. Mainly SFR and Canal +. So you can not access it via your Internet operator for example, there is an alternative solution: the 100% digital offer of RMC Sport (or OTT). A subscription available at a price of 9 euros per month for mobile or fixed subscribers of SFR, 19 euros per month with commitment / 25 euros per month without commitment for non-subscribers.
Discover below the list of supports to watch RMC Sport streaming:


iPhone, iPad, iPod Touch


Android


PC / Mac via Internet browser type Chrome, Safari, Microsoft Edge

Chromecast, Apple TV, Samsung Smart TV, Nvidia Shield, Philips with Connect TV option
